title: 8x10 Vintage Style Sign with Sunflower Saying,"Welcome to MAWMAW'S PLACE Weekends, Weekdays, Whenever" Decorative Fun Universal Household Family Signs for Grandma (8x10)
features: A very welcoming sign featuring a popular nickname for Grandma! Mawmaw is going to adore it!
It features a faux vintage style design with a wonderful Sunflower. The pattern was made to look older than it actually is.
Easy to Hang: Simple black cord can hang anywhere in the house! Just need a nail or hook!
Mother’s Day Friendly! Also great for Birthdays, Christmas, National Grandparent's Day, and other Special Occasions!
Size: 8x10 Inches - A perfect addition to Grandma’s home decor!
description: Signs are made of tempered hardboard and have a vintage faux finished background which creates the illusion of an aged vintage sign. It is well made and displays beautifully.
